content: {"locationId": "8887", "organizationId": "7327", "name": "Community Market of Pottawatomie County Food & Resource Center", "address1": "120 S Center", "address2": "", "city": "Shawnee", "state": "OK", "zipCode": "74801", "country": null, "phone": "405-788-4957", "phoneExt": "", "website": "https://ourcommunitymarket.org/", "latitude": "35.32699", "longitude": "-96.90814", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "COUNTY:  Pottawatomie. Seminole, Southern Lincoln counties", "languages": "English, Spanish", "features": "Air Conditioning", "aboutUs": "Community Market of Pottawatomie County is a food and resource center that feeds families in Pottawatomie County, Seminole County, and southern Lincoln County and provides connections that enable lasting change.", "notes": "FIRST-TIME SHOPPERS MUST BRING:   If you are shopping with us for the first time, there are some things you need to bring:   You will need a form of ID. Acceptable forms of ID include a driver's license, school ID, social security card, CDIB card, or birth certificate.   You must also bring a recent utility bill or a copy of your lease to show your address. If you are homeless, you can let the person in the intake office know about your situation.   You will also need to provide basic information about other household members.   You can receive assistance every 30 days.     RETURNING SHOPPERS MUST BRING:   If you are returning to shopping with us, there are some things you need to bring:   You will need a form of ID. Acceptable forms of ID include a driver's license, school ID, social security card, CDIB card, or birth certificate.   Your return card is helpful if you have it.   You can receive assistance every 30 days.", "contactName": "", "contactPhone": "405-788-4957", "contactEmail": "", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "Accepts Walk-Ins, CSFP Program, Indoor
